name: Step into reality
description:
It must be weird to be a fictional character whose story is in the hands of a writer... What if they found a way to leave their world?

That's what happened one day; the reality gets replaced by the world of a book.

Explore and find a way to turn things back to normal.

This is a game which uses the characters from the story "to be beautiful" from the book into the pit written by Scott Cawthon and Elley Cooper which uses the RPG mechanics (No battles included.)

This is my first game and I tried to make it simple. Any feedback is helpful specially in terms of storytelling!
